creature.Name: Banbaro
creature.description: A monster with two giant horns, like a running brick wall. It charges at threats while digging its massive horns in the ground, sometimes picking up entire trees along the way.

creature.Name: Deviljho
creature.description: A monster that must feed constantly and will devour anything in its path, even feeding on the largest of monsters with its massive jowls.

creature.Name: Bazelgeuse
creature.description: A nefarious flying wyvern that travels the New World in search of prey. It scatters explosive scales over a wide area to prey on whatever gets caught in the blast

creature.Name: Savage Deviljho
creature.description: A mutated Deviljho variant, driven mad by its overpowering hunger. It will attempt to feed on all it sees.

creature.Name: Coral Pukei-Pukei
creature.description: A bird wyvern that stockpiles water inside its body, fortified by the plant life it consumes. When threatened it can expel a powerful stream from its mouth or tail.

creature.Name: Fulgur Anjanath
creature.description: With every attack, this Anjanath subspecies fortifies itself with electricity that it charges within its jaws and dorsal membrane.

creature.Name: Kirin
creature.description: Kirin are so rarely sighted that little is known of their ecology. It's been said they envelop themselves in pure electricity when they are provoked.

creature.Name: Arch Tempered Kirin
creature.description: Kirin are so rarely sighted that little is known of their ecology. It's been said they envelop themselves in pure electricity when they are provoked.

creature.Name: Legiana
creature.description: The apex monster of the Coral Highlands, whose diet primarily consists of Raphinos. It emits a chilling wind from its body, which dulls its prey's ability to escape.

creature.Name: Namielle
creature.description: An Elder Dragon said to be able to command water and use it as a shield. Though very few sightings have ever been reported, they mention 'exploding water' and 'bright glowing lights.' Its existence remains shrouded in mystery

creature.Name: Arch Tempered Namielle
creature.description: An Elder Dragon said to be able to command water and use it as a shield. Though very few sightings have ever been reported, they mention 'exploding water' and 'bright glowing lights.' Its existence remains shrouded in mystery

creature.Name: Nargacuga
creature.description: A flying wyvern covered in pitch black fur. It is extremely agile, especially on the ground, moving with explosive bursts of speed.

creature.Name: Ruiner Nergigante
creature.description: Countless battles have only hardened this Nergigante variant. In addition to healing, its spikes grow tougher as it loses health.

creature.Name: Rajang
creature.description: An ultra-aggressive creature that few have a chance of surviving against. Sports powerful arms that pack a punch, and turns gold when angry.

creature.Name: Ebony Odoragon
creature.description: This Odogaron subspecies is forever on the prowl for its next meal, and is often seen carrying fresh kills in its mouth. Reports indicate it goes into a frenzy upon eating.

creature.Name: Pink Rathian
creature.description: A subspecies with vibrant pink scales. Pink Rathians wield their toxic tails more deftly than normal Rathians, weakening prey with poison before moving in for the kill.

creature.Name: Tzitzi-Ya-Ku
creature.description: This odd monster blinds both prey and enemies with a special pulsing organ near its head. It then uses its strong legs to deliver finishing blows.

creature.Name: Zignore
creature.description: Lightning courses through the fur and unique plating of this fanged wyvern. It is most deadly in its supercharged state.

creature.Name: Aptonoth
creature.description: Docile herbivores that graze in packs. Their meat is considered a delicacy and is rich in nutrients. If one member of the herd is attacked, the rest will flee immediately

creature.Name: Kestodon
creature.description: Female Kestodon will alert the pack of danger, while the males will violently charge would-be threats. Their rushing charges can be blocked, however, leaving them open to attacks

creature.Name: Vespoid
creature.description: Insects that paralyze their targets with their long stingers. They break easily, so attack them with poison or slinger ammo if you want to carve them.

creature.Name: Yellow Boi
creature.description: It stores paralyzing gas in its body and releases it when threatened! See? Here, in its soma-AGH! I...I can't...mooove...
